description: A cozy cafe offering a variety of coffee drinks, pastries, and snacks. Enjoy a relaxing atmosphere with a warm and inviting ambiance. Perfect for a casual hangout or a quick coffee break.
A restaurant serving traditional Bosnian cuisine with a focus on local ingredients and homemade dishes. Experience the authentic flavors of Hadžići and the surrounding region.
A bakery offering a wide variety of freshly baked goods. From bread and pastries to local specialties, Pekara Igman has something for everyone.
Another popular bakery in Hadžići, known for its delicious pastries, bread, and other baked treats. A must-visit for anyone with a sweet tooth.
A restaurant offering a mix of local and international dishes. Enjoy a meal in a comfortable setting, perfect for family gatherings or a night out with friends.
A fast food joint offering a variety of quick and tasty meals. From burgers and fries to local fast food favorites, Fast Food MB is a great choice for a casual meal.
A centrally located bakery offering a range of baked goods. Stop by for a quick snack or to pick up some fresh bread and pastries.
